name: ClusterSubnetGroup
shortDesc: Creates an Amazon Redshift subnet group. You must provide a list of one or more subnets in your existing Amazon VPC when creating an Amazon Redshift subnet group.

properties.name: Description
properties.desc: A description of the subnet group.

properties.name: SubnetIds
properties.desc: A list of VPC subnet IDs. You can modify a maximum of 20 subnets.
